comment._content: William Corcoran Eustice Here is the first clue from January 17, 1913. I will look up the full article and post it later. He appears to have headed the Woodrow Wilson inauguration of March 4, 1913. Van Wert Daily Bulletin; January 17, 1913 ... elect Wilson wrote a letter to William C. Eustice chairman of the Inaugural committee ... Hartford Courant; January 17, 1913 This became known today when he sent a letter to William Corcoran Eustice at Washington, chairman of the inauguration committee, asking him to consider the ... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Corcoran_Eustis [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3313652411]
